name: Do Not Repair This Game Again
name_original: Do Not Repair This Game Again
description:
You are the most powerful deity of these lands, click on the icons to help your creatures.

Do you remember that I said you were the most powerful deity? Well, every time you touch a button (or icon), you will break it, I know because I know you.

#GGJ2020 #MJW11

Art: @isfergamer

Programming: @DavidFdez_G

Music: Patrick de Arteaga
